languages.text: "О, моя охота, {name}, началась, когда кровавые реки разлились в Разломах Гекатона! Когда песнь хора взмолившихся о смерти пронеслась эхом меж планет!" {n}Радостный голос Каллигоса грохочет словно гром.{/n} "То была великая битва, в которой я впервые ощутил саму жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "О, моя охота, {name}, началась, когда кровавые реки разлились в Разломах Гекатона! Когда песнь хора взмолившихся о смерти пронеслась эхом меж планет!" {n}Радостный голос Каллигоса грохочет словно гром.{/n} "То была великая битва, в которой я впервые ощутил саму жизнь".

languages.text: "Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilt in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."
languages.original_text: "О, моя охота, {name}, началась, когда кровавые реки разлились в Разломах Гекатона! Когда песнь хора взмолившихся о смерти пронеслась эхом меж планет!" {n}Радостный голос Каллигоса грохочет словно гром.{/n} "То была великая битва, в которой я впервые ощутил саму жизнь".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilled in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice is booming like thunder.{/n} "It was a great battle where I got my first taste of the life itself."

"Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilled in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice is booming like thunder.{/n} "It was a great battle where I got my first taste of the life itself."

"Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilled in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice is booming like thunder.{/n} "It was a great battle and it was when I got my first taste of what it's like to be alive."

When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice is booming like thunder.{/n} "It was a great battle and it was when I got my first taste of what it's like to be alive."

When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."

"Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilt in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."

languages.text: «Oh, {name}, ¡mi caza empezó con los ríos de sangre derramados en las Brechas de Hecaton! Cuando los cánticos de un coro de condenados se hizo eco entre las estrellas, ¡suplicando la muerte!». {n}La alegre voz de Calligos retumba como el trueno.{/n} «Fue en esa gran batalla donde por primera vez pude ver lo que es estar vivo de verdad».
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilt in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, {name}, ¡mi caza empezó con los ríos de sangre derramados en las Brechas de Hecaton! Cuando los cánticos de un coro de condenados se hizo eco entre las estrellas, ¡suplicando la muerte!». {n}La alegre voz de Calligos retumba como el trueno.{/n} «Fue una gran batalla, la primera en la que pude ver lo que es estar vivo de verdad».

languages.text: « Oh, {name}, ma chasse a commencé lorsque des rivières de sang se sont déversées dans les Grands Récifs d'Hecaton ! Lorsque le chant d'un chœur de damnés priant pour la mort a retenti parmi les étoiles ! {n}répond Calligos d'une voix aussi joviale que tonitruante.{/n} C'est lors de cette formidable bataille que j'ai compris ce qu'être en vie signifiait vraiment. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilt in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, {name}, ma chasse a commencé lorsque des rivières de sang se sont déversées dans les Grands Récifs d'Hecaton ! Lorsque le chant d'un chœur de damnés priant pour la mort a retenti parmi les étoiles ! {n}répond Calligos d'une voix aussi joviale que tonitruante.{/n} C'est lors de cette formidable bataille que j'ai compris ce qu'être en vie signifiait vraiment. »

languages.text: 「おう、{name}、俺の狩りはヘカトンの裂け目で血の川が流れた時に始まったのさ！呪われたコーラスが星々に木霊し、死を懇願したときにな！」{n}カリゴスの嬉しそうな声は雷鳴のごとく轟く。{/n}「偉大な戦いだった。あの時、俺は初めて本当に生きてるってことの妙味を知ったのよ」
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilt in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."

traits.locale_text: 「おう、{name}、俺の狩りはヘカトンの裂け目で血の川が流れた時に始まったのさ！呪われたコーラスが星々に木霊し、死を懇願したときにな！」{n}カリゴスの嬉しそうな声は雷鳴のごとく轟く。{/n}「偉大な戦いだった。あの時俺は、初めて生きてるってことの妙味を知ったのよ」

languages.text: “噢，{name}，我最初的狩猎，是赫卡顿断带血流成河的时候！被诅咒者的合唱在群星间回响，乞求死亡！”{n}卡里戈斯欢快的声音仿佛雷鸣一般。{/n}“就是在那场血战之中，我第一次体会到了真正活着的感觉。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilt in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."

traits.locale_text: “噢，{name}，我最初的狩猎，是赫卡顿断带血流成河的时候！被诅咒者的合唱在群星间回响，乞求死亡！”{n}卡里戈斯欢快的声音仿佛雷鸣一般。{/n}“那是场伟大的战斗，也是我第一次体会到真正活着的感觉。”

languages.text: "Ach, {name}, meine Jagd hat begonnen, als sich in den Rissen von Hecaton die Blutflüsse ergossen! Als das Lied eines Chors der Verdammten zwischen den Sternen widerhallte, um den Tod bettelnd!" {n}Calligos' freudige Stimme dröhnt wie Donner.{/n} "Inmitten einer gewaltigen Schlacht habe ich erstmals erfahren, was es heißt, wirklich lebendig zu sein."
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilt in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, {name}, meine Jagd hat begonnen, als sich in den Rissen von Hecaton die Blutflüsse ergossen! Als das Lied eines Chors der Verdammten zwischen den Sternen widerhallte, um den Tod bettelnd!" {n}Calligos' freudige Stimme dröhnt wie Donner.{/n} "Es war ein großer Kampf, und ich habe dadurch erstmals geschmeckt, was es heißt, am Leben zu sein."

languages.text: "Avım, Hecaton Yarıklarındaki kan nehirleri ayrıldığında başladı {name}! Lanetlilerin korosunun şarkısı yıldızlar arasında yankılandığında ve ölmek için yalvardığında!" {n}Calligos'un neşeli sesi, şimşek gibi gürlüyor.{/n} "Gerçekten hayatta olduğumu hissettiğim ilk an, ihtişamlı bir muharebe sırasındaydı."
languages.original_text: "Oh, {name}, my hunt began when the blood rivers spilt in the Rifts of Hecaton! When the song of a chorus of the damned echoed among the stars, pleading for death!" {n}Calligos's joyful voice booms like thunder.{/n} "It was in the midst of a great battle when I first experienced what it means to be truly alive."
